mapper.sql: id as id, dic_label as dicLabel, dic_value as dicValue, description as description, lifecycle as lifecycle, group_value as groupValue, group_name as groupName, lang as lang, function_name as functionName, order_num as orderNum, is_edit as isEdit, create_time as createTime, last_modify_time as lastModifyTime, operator_id as operatorId, group_id as groupId
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sys_dictionary ( id, dic_label , dic_value , description , lifecycle , group_value , group_name , lang , function_name , order_num , is_edit , create_time , last_modify_time , operator_id , group_id ) VALUES ( #{id,javaType=java.lang.Long,jdbcType=BIGINT} , #{dicLabel,javaType=java.lang.String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{dicValue,javaType=java.lang.String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{description,javaType=java.lang.String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{lifecycle,javaType=java.lang.Integer,jdbcType=INTEGER} , #{groupValue,javaType=java.lang.String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{groupName,javaType=java.lang.String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{lang,javaType=java.lang.String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{functionName,javaType=java.lang.String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{orderNum,javaType=java.lang.Integer,jdbcType=INTEGER} , #{isEdit,javaType=java.lang.Integer,jdbcType=INTEGER} , #{createTime,javaType=java.util.Date,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} , #{lastModifyTime,javaType=java.util.Date,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} , #{operatorId,javaType=java.lang.Long,jdbcType=BIGINT} , #{groupId,javaType=java.lang.Long,jdbcType=BIGINT} )
mapper.update: UPDATE sys_dictionary SET dic_label = #{dicLabel,javaType=java.lang.String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , dic_value = #{dicValue,javaType=java.lang.String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , description = #{description,javaType=java.lang.String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , lifecycle = #{lifecycle,javaType=java.lang.Integer,jdbcType=INTEGER} , group_value = #{groupValue,javaType=java.lang.String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , group_name = #{groupName,javaType=java.lang.String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , lang = #{lang,javaType=java.lang.String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , function_name = #{functionName,javaType=java.lang.String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , order_num = #{orderNum,javaType=java.lang.Integer,jdbcType=INTEGER} , is_edit = #{isEdit,javaType=java.lang.Integer,jdbcType=INTEGER} , create_time = #{createTime,javaType=java.util.Date,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} , last_modify_time = #{lastModifyTime,javaType=java.util.Date,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} , operator_id = #{operatorId,javaType=java.lang.Long,jdbcType=BIGINT} , group_id = #{groupId,javaType=java.lang.Long,jdbcType=BIGINT} WHERE id = #{id}
